The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 October is 572,667 (1,017.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 11 October, there were 90,526 new confirmed cases (160.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 October, there were 70,062 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 29% ( 20,464 extra cases).
